overview: This series explores the band that forms between two girls when they share a man. Featured cover girls Avery Cristy and Naomi Swann have a fierce rivalry between them that exceeds friendly competition. When Naomi catches Avery getting intimate with their instructor, she figures two can play at that game. Also up for tag-team action are Ariana Marie & Cecilia Lion, Sybil & Lika Star, and Avi Love & Savannah Sixx.
title: Threesome Fantasies 9
